6.2.4 ATTRIBUTES

6.2.4.3 CONTEXT ATTRIBUTES

In defining higher level features from abstractions, information concerning the simple feature in terms of the part is often required. The different contexts found are as follow:

Relative Placement

Absolute Placement

Non-singular Existence

Previously Defined Features

Neighboring Features

Relative Placement
Absolute (or Global) Placement
Non-Singular Existence
Prior Definition
Neighboring Features
Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
